cardsA.title: Queen of the strength of will
cardsA.content:
Instrument of inner strength in the hands of the charioteer to guide the colt. '
'
cardsA.section: It allows him to control it, speed up his pace or slow it down and stop it.
cardsA.footer: If this rein of Power bursts, the Colt runs wild.

cardsA.title: Stairways of Availability
cardsA.content: It is good will to be entirely willing to do what needs to be done.
cardsA.section: To achieve harmony and inner peace
cardsA.footer: and ascend joyfully on the path of liberation.

cardsA.title: Sword of Right Action
cardsA.content: It is the correct use of Good Will oriented towards Harmonization
cardsA.section: Making Correct Decisions at every moment of the Way opens the Path of Righteousness
cardsA.footer: Which is eternal availability, Conquers the kingdom of realization.

cardsA.title: The Law of Compensation
cardsA.content: Step by Step I build my own Path
cardsA.section: moment to moment I reap what I sow, I sow what I reap
cardsA.footer: at every moment I give what I receive and receive what I give

cardsA.title: Beast of Attachment and Fear
cardsA.content: By making our well-being depend only on external material treasures we forget the inner treasures
cardsA.section: Compulsively clinging to people and things, to Money and Pleasure
cardsA.footer: we generate obsessive fear of losing what we have or not achieving what we desire

cardsA.title: Shield of Inner Responsibility
cardsA.content: I am the Only Owner of my Inner Kingdom, Thought, Will and Emotions
cardsA.section: I Change with Courage what I can and have to change
cardsA.footer: and I build my Destiny with the decisions made at every Instant of the Way

cardsA.title: Path of Freedom
cardsA.content: True Freedom is born of Truth and is Inner
cardsA.section: is to Break the Chains of destructive Attachments and negative attitudes
cardsA.footer: is to leave the Prisons of Fear and Fear in Suffering

cardsA.title: Ruby of Strength
cardsA.content: Gift from the King father that gives us the Inner Power to Act with determination
cardsA.section: DO what we have to do in the Light of Wisdom
cardsA.footer: Do Not Do what we should not Do on the Path of Realization

cardsB.title: Queen of Positive Thinking
cardsB.content:
Instrument of Inner Light in the hands of the Charioteer to guide the Colt'
'
cardsB.section: It allows him to remember the past project to the future Knowledge and Communication
cardsB.footer: If the Charioteer does not use this rein of Light well the colt loses its Course

cardsB.title: Lookout of the Open Mind
cardsB.content: In a Quiet and Attentive Mind that uses the Instrument of thought correctly
cardsB.section: Through Communication and Understanding with ourselves and others
cardsB.footer: It is open to Learning the lessons that Life gives it

cardsB.title: Torch of Self-Knowledge
cardsB.content: It is the Light that illuminates our Path towards the Realization of the Vision of ourselves
cardsB.section: Who we are where we came from where we are going
cardsB.footer: What is our Mission and Meas, Strengths and weaknesses, Opportunities and Threats

cardsB.title: The Law of Reality
cardsB.content: People and things ARE AS THEY ARE
cardsB.section: Neither as I want them to be Nor as they were or will be Nor as I believe they are
cardsB.footer: Things are as they are and seeing them as they are is true Self-Knowledge

cardsB.title: Jungle of Self-Deception
cardsB.content: From the Deception and Falsehood of a Closed Mind
cardsB.section: we cannot see People and Circumstances as they are
cardsB.footer: and the deception to ourselves we relate from the lie with the external world

cardsB.title: Fire of Acceptance
cardsB.content: In the Light of Understanding, I Accept with Serenity what I cannot change
cardsB.section: In People, in Circumstances and in myself
cardsB.footer: I do not generate futile effort trying to change what cannot be changed

cardsB.title: Door of Truth
cardsB.content: It is to See and Accept people and things AS THEY ARE
cardsB.section: It is the Treasure of Reality without the veils and Illusions of the Mind and the Ego
cardsB.footer: only the truth in the light of Wisdom can make us Free

cardsB.title: Gold of Wisdom
cardsB.content: Gift of Universal Light That allows us to see ourselves With Humility in our true dimension
cardsB.section: It is not Knowledge or Information it is to See clearly the correct path
cardsB.footer: and Follow the Light on the Ascent Path to Knowing how to Live

cardsB.title: Crown of Inner Silence
cardsB.content: It is the Quietness of the Mind in which the Voice of Conscience can be heard
cardsB.section: It is the Refuge where the Inner Warrior is Strengthened
cardsB.footer: Only in Silence is the Truth revealed and things as they are

cardsC.title: COLT OF INSTINCTS, EMOTIONS AND DESIRES
cardsC.content:
It is the Colt of good and necessary Natural Instincts and Desires'
'
cardsC.section:
- Satisfy basic material needs'
' - Search for position in the herd, - Want pleasure and flee from Pain
cardsC.footer: How the Charioteer guides it with the Reins of Light and Power depends on their mutual Well-being

cardsC.title: Bridge of Wanting
cardsC.content: It is wanting with all the Heart to conquer the Kingdom of Harmony and Inner Peace
cardsC.section: Want it as the drowned man desires and needs air to breathe
cardsC.footer: It is the first step we take on the Path of Liberation

cardsC.title: Steed of Enthusiasm
cardsC.content: Inner Strength of Motivation that leads me to Love and enjoy my Mission
cardsC.section: it Drives us in the Search for Satisfaction and Inner Well-being
cardsC.footer: Lovingly, the Warrior feeds it with the Hay of Perseverance

cardsC.title: The law of inner well-being
cardsC.content: In our Inner Well-being it is not so determinant what happens to us
cardsC.section: as if the Attitude we take towards what happens to us
cardsC.footer: Everything is an Opportunity and a Lesson to Learn and Grow

cardsC.title: prison of sterile suffering
cardsC.content: Almost all suffering comes from the Mind creating Attachments and Fears
cardsC.section: taking Negative Attitudes towards People and Circumstances
cardsC.footer: It is manufactured by the Mind that places Shackles of Dissatisfaction and Conflict on us

cardsC.title: key of positive attitude
cardsC.content: From an Open Mind I assume Positive Attitudes. Before what happens to me.
cardsC.section: Instead of changing what cannot be changed I CHANGE MY ATTITUDE

cardsC.title: peak of love
cardsC.content: The End and the Meaning of Life is LOVE for ourselves
cardsC.section: manifesting in SERVICE and Search for the Well-being of others
cardsC.footer: To be Free in the Law to Love! It is the Emblem and the Slogan of the Inner Warrior

cardsC.title: diamond of serenity
cardsC.content: Supreme Peace beyond the Mind, Thought and Ego
cardsC.section: Descends upon us as a Treasure from the King Father
cardsC.footer: when with Strength we follow the light of Wisdom on the Path of Righteousness

cardsC.title: THRONE OF INNER SATISFACTION
cardsC.content: It is the Satisfaction of the three, Needs in the Kingdom of Inner Harmony
cardsC.footer: Having satisfied these needs we find Realization in Inner Kingdom
